name: Moonrise (itch)
description: Moonrise is a turn-based Roguelike in which a woman is cursed by the bite of a werewolf and must race to the center of Asenia, the City of the Wolf, before the next full moon in order to find the cure. If she fails, she will never be rid of the curse and will eventually descend into the rabid madness which all werewolves eventually succumb to. The city, however, has been consumed by the flames of revolution, so our huntress must confront many dangers, both human and werewolf.
